description:
Bay was an http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Alliance] commodore an a confidante of Chairman http://anidb.net/ch743 [Job Trunicht]. As a captain during the coup d`etat in 797 UC, Bay pretended to support the http://anidb.net/ch6225 [National Salvation Military Council] while keeping Trunicht aware of all of what was happening. Later, he was promoted for his work and acted as Trunicht`s security chief during the government`s inquiry of Admiral http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli].
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Bay
